attributes.action: Give the Queen money to restore Buckingham Palace.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Queen is our Head of State, and she uses Buckingham Palace to entertain dignitaries from all over the world on behalf of her Government.  It is a disgrace that public money is not being made available to restore this building.
The cost would be a fraction of the Dome or Olympics.  It is unlikely that this would happen in any other country.  I doubt the Palace of Verseille or the White House have been left to fall into disrepair.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
